title: The Rise Of The Catfish Kingdom
description: (Young Adults 12-20) The story is set approximately 50 years after the battle of Dry Mass It introduces to the ocean world for the first time The Catfish Kingdom and the menace and dangers to the ocean world that they bring 2nd book in the Ocean World Series. This story looks more into depth at the character The Whale Catcher whilst travelling throughout the deepest and darkest depths of the ocean world. Areas that contain toxic and nuclear waste materials from old relics left generations before by the human race, how possibly could the human race have known 600 years ago what the long term environmental marine effects would be as the result of their biological and nuclear activities? But then again did the humans care 600 years ago?
author: Ian Allan
